questions.question: Are ocean waves present and breaking onto the sandy shore?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the representation uses abstract patterns to depict waves using undulating and curvilinear forms that suggest movement typical of ocean waves breaking onto a shore. These patterns convey the idea of waves visually, even if abstractly. Thus, combining this visual representation with the common understanding of ocean waves interacting with a shore, the answer can be affirmed.

questions.question: Is the sandy beach present and curving from the foreground toward the right side of the image?
questions.explanation: Image B presents geometrical shapes and lines that imply a beach through the distribution of colors and patterns. The abstract curving forms and color compositions suggest a sandy area curving towards the right side if interpreted through the lens of artistic abstraction of a beach scene.

questions.question: Are palm trees visible along the coastline on the right side of the image?

questions.question: Is the sky visible above the horizon, featuring clouds with warm orange and pink tones near the horizon and transitioning to blue higher up?
